Actions.Name: QueryData
Actions.Description: Provides a list of field names and values corresponding to the requested query and search parameters.  Results can be paged.

Actions.Name: QueryList
Actions.Description: Returns a list of all predefined queries that the caller may request.

Actions.Name: QueryTable
Actions.Description: Provides a table of results corresponding to the requested query and search parameters.

Actions.Name: Send File
Actions.Description: Submit file contents and metadata for storage in the RecFind 6 database. Returns a URL to the stored file.
